      • toPostEntity

        public java.lang.String toPostEntity()
        Formats the question in a JSON object. Example: "{" + " \"question\":\"What is the answer to life, the universe and everything?\"," + " \"answers\": [ \"42\", \"24\" ]," + " \"solutionIndex\": 0," + " \"tags\": [ \"h2g2\", \"trivia\" ]" + " }";
        Returns:
        a formatted JSON object that fits for posting on sweng website
